TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "red_concrete", "quantity": 50, "index": 11}, {"type": "horn_coral_block", "quantity": 53, "index": 23}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 17, "index": 24}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "oak_door", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "orange_concrete", "quantity": 16, "index": 37}, {"type": "music_disc_chirp", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "cooked_chicken", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft pink_concrete_powder, I first need to craft pink_dye. I have pink_tulip at slot 45, which I can craft into pink_dye, so I will move it into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
